Action to trigger when clicking on Forgo.other: Actie om te activeren bij het klikken op wachtwoord vergeten

Activate the users management system to.other: Activate the users management system to protect your Pydio installation.

Add a Forgot Password link at the bottom.other: Add a Forgot Password link at the bottom of the login form

Create a local copy (at login time) of m.other: Create a local copy (at login time) of master users inside slave base

Disable the check of failed login attemp.other: Disable the check of failed login attempts, will disable the Captcha display

Enable the 'guest' user, who does not ne.other: Schakel de 'gast'-gebruiker in die niet hoeft in te loggen.

In Master_Slave mode, use this option to.other: In Master_Slave mode, use this option to limit the users listing in the administration to one driver only (leave empty if you want to see all users)

Master/slave will assume that the master.other: Master/slave will assume that the master is read-only, and the slave is a local alternative to allow sharing features. User Choice will allow the user to manually choose its authentication method at startup.

Minimum number of characters required fo.other: Minimum number of characters required for passwords in the application

Options applied to all auth drivers.other: Options applied to all auth drivers

Raise the security of the login form by.other: Raise the security of the login form by disabling autocompletion and remember me feature

Set the users credentials in the session.other: Set the users credentials in the session after a successful login, this can be necessary when bridging specific auth and access plugins.

This is necessary to discriminate users.other: This is necessary to discriminate users data loaded from various sources. Warning, use folder name compliant characters. For example :: does not work!

Whether the users identifiers should be.other: Whether the users identifiers should be case sensitive or not. WARNING, sql-based drivers will disable this by default, even if you check this.

Will be shown to the user at login.other: Wordt getoond aan de gebruiker bij het inloggen

Action to trigger when clicking on Forgo.other: Action to trigger when clicking on Forgot Password. Can be changed to trigger a custom action if you rely on external authentication system.

When relying on an external authenticati.other: When relying on an external authentication system, replace the Forgot Action with an external link that will be opened in a new window.

Whether users can create their own cells.other: Whether users can create their own cells or not

Directory search is looking for labels '.other: Directory search is looking for labels 'starting with' the search string. Switching this on will prepend a wildcard to look for labels 'containing' the string.
